pages.text: Beams are a new building block that bears some resemblance to fence posts or walls. By default, a beam's placement is a straight line based on the direction in which it is placed. However, you can use the wrench to enable or disable any of the six sides of a beam, allowing for infinite possibilities!

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: There are over a hundred types of beams, but all follow the same recipe pattern.
